reviews.review_msg: Took her online course and for a W course, its the 2nd easiest one I've taken (I've taken 5). Not to mention the content is actually insightful and fulfilling if you're okay with self-reflection. The grading/weight is distributed really well and the reading is made extremely manageable, with only 4 'modules' of reading for the ENTIRE semester
Dr. Guyevskey is amazing! Her assignments were very easy and she was a very easy grader. If you want a gpa booster class, take EDUC 100 with Dr. Guyevskey.

Professor Guyevskey has a bad rep from a few years ago but I really think she changed it around. She is quick to reply to emails, seems caring in her replies and does not overwhelm students with assignments. I once had an assignment that I needed to submit a little late, I explained my situation and she was nothing but understanding.
